product_name: The North Face Mountain Light Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Mountain Light women's jacket is lightweight and durable, and provides high-performance comfort. This proven classic is ideal for light mountaineering, backpacking and skiing. 2-layer Gore-Tex(R) Performance polyester shell is waterproof, windproof and breathable; all seams are sealed for complete protection. Free-hanging taffeta lining enhances moisture movement and warmth. Fully adjustable, removable drop hood features a tall zip-up collar that offers lower-face protection against harsh weather; brushed collar lining is kind to skin. 2-way front zipper features double stormflaps. Self-fabric adjustable cuffs tabs and drawcord hem. The North Face Mountain Light jacket has zippered hand pockets that double as core vents; includes an internal security pocket. Standard fit ensures freedom of motion. Integration feature lets you zip in compatible The North Face mid-layer insulating pieces.
short_description: The North Face Mountain Light women's jacket is lightweight and durable, and provides high-performance comfort. This proven classic is ideal for light mountaineering, backpacking and skiing.
